content: SUV line test vehicles require oil changes every 7,500 miles. AWD coupling fluid check at 15,000 miles.
EcoSedan hybrid battery check at 20,000 miles or every 2 years. Inverter coolant flush at 40,000.
metadata: Maintenance ID: ECO-2Y, battery brand: Voltix

content: EV Crossover recommended software updates at each service interval (approx every 10k miles). Tire rotation is crucial due to heavier front load.
metadata: Service code: EVC-333, OTA updates possible

content: Light-duty pickup recommended diesel filter change at 10,000 miles. Gas version: 7,500 miles oil change interval.
Hydrogen concept sedan requires specialized hydrogen system check. Currently done only at pilot service centers.
metadata: Prototype: FCSED-Alpha, limited service points: 3 in US
